p: Concerning furocoumarins intake from food, in Great Britain, the furocoumarin intake has been estimated to be up to 1.2 mg per person per day corresponding to approximately 0.02 mg/kg bw per day for 60 kg bw (COT, 1996 as cited by SKLM, 2010). In Germany, the estimated average total daily intake of furocoumarins from non‚Äêflavoured and flavoured foods is approximately 0.56 mg/person per day (~ 0.01 mg/kg bw per day for 60 kg bw), flavoured foods contributing to about 10% to the total intake (SKLM, 2006, 2010). Reported exposure levels for furocoumarin intake from food for the general population are below the phototoxicity threshold dose (0.25 mg/kg bw for 60 kg bw) and have not been associated with an additional risk of skin cancer.
